use-mysql-query.query: SELECT ci.id, ci.brief_name, ci.full_name, ci.city, ci.industry, ci.establish_time, ci.operating_status, ci.staff, ci.website FROM crm_company_info ci WHERE ci.city IN ('北京', '上海', '广州', '深圳', '深圳市', '广州市', '上海市') LIMIT 20;
